thread.title: Great Location
thread.title_full: Great Location - Review of Hilton Garden Inn New York/Manhattan-Chelsea, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: I7421OOvanessaa
title: Great Location
text: We stayed at this hotel as this is the one we chose in 2013. Close to MSG which is why we were in NYC both times. We walked practically everywhere. High Line, Chelsea Market, Serendipity, Times Square. Union Square Park, Gramercy Park. Central Park. Had a blast at the St. Patrick's Day Parade, so many people. Will stay here again and again.
